- Unsteady walking
- Vertigo
- Elevated hemoglobin levels
- High blood pressure
THESE SYMPTOMS CAME INTO FRUITION:

I’ve had these episodes of spinning sensation, like the room is tilting, especially when I stand up quickly. I’ve also been told my blood pressure is higher than usual during my check-ups, and I recently had blood tests showing my hemoglobin is elevated. I’ve been at high altitude for a couple of months for work, and I have a history of hypertension and some mild lung issues.

My blood pressure’s been higher too when I check it, and my latest blood tests showed my hemoglobin was really high. I’ve been at a high place for a while, and I have some lung problems and high blood pressure, so I was worried about what might be going on.
